title: Guizhou
summary: Guizhou /ɡweɪˈdʒoʊ/[5] (Chinese: 贵州; alternately Kweichow) is a landlocked province in the southwest region of the People's Republic of China. Its capital and largest city is Guiyang, in the center of the province. Guizhou borders the autonomous region of Guangxi to the south, Yunnan to the west, Sichuan to the northwest, the municipality of Chongqing to the north, and Hunan to the east. The population of Guizhou stands at 38.5 million,  ranking 18th among the provinces in China.
